Returns: a string representation of this CRL entry.
toString().Description: Returns a string representation of this CRL entry.

Returns: the encoded form of this certificate
getEncoded().Description: Returns the ASN.1 DER-encoded form of this CRL Entry, that is the inner SEQUENCE.

Returns: the issuer of the X509Certificate described by this entry or null if it is issued by the CRL issuer.
getCertificateIssuer().Description: Get the issuer of the X509Certificate described by this entry. If the certificate issuer is also the CRL issuer, this method returns null. This method is used with indirect CRLs. The default implementation always returns null. Subclasses that wish to support indirect CRLs should override it.

getSerialNumber().Description: Gets the serial number from this X509CRLEntry, the userCertificate.

Returns: true iff the encoded forms of the two CRL entries match, false otherwise.
Parameters: Object: the object to test for equality with this CRL entry.
equals(java.lang.Object).Description: Compares this CRL entry for equality with the given object. If the other object is an instanceof X509CRLEntry, then its encoded form (the inner SEQUENCE) is retrieved and compared with the encoded form of this CRL entry.

Returns: true if this entry has extensions, false otherwise.
hasExtensions().Description: Returns true if this CRL entry has extensions.

getRevocationDate().Description: Gets the revocation date from this X509CRLEntry, the revocationDate.

Returns: the reason the certificate has been revoked, or null if this CRL entry does not have a Reason Code extension
getRevocationReason().Description: Returns the reason the certificate has been revoked, as specified in the Reason Code extension of this CRL entry.

hashCode().Description: Returns a hashcode value for this CRL entry from its encoded form.

ClassDesc: Abstract class for a revoked certificate in a CRL (Certificate Revocation List). The ASN.1 definition for revokedCertificates is:
